head.description: General Settings for the Nighscout Applet

refreshInterval.description: Refresh Interval for your Nightscout applet:
refreshInterval.tooltip: Increase or decrease this spinner value to change the refresh interval - use a slow refresh if you have a slow machine.

host.tooltip: A host where your CGM information gonna be queried

showMissing.tooltip: Add information about missing readings in the text

showMissingInterval.description: When start to show missing readings alert
showMissingInterval.tooltip: Time which is taken to decide when to show alert of missing readings. Will apply only if above checkbox is enabled

showiob.tooltip: Enable/disable IoB (insulin on board) in the text
